sentences.en: Aims : to explore ways of treating Female and impatient gonorrhea.
sentences.cn: 目的 探讨十年来治疗女性急性淋病的体会.

sentences.en: Always gonorrhea, likely sees own back at present, stands in the spacious tomb.
sentences.cn: 眼前总是一片白, 象看见了自己的背影, 站在空旷的墓地.

sentences.en: CONCLUSION Penicillin and Tetracycline are not appropriate for gonorrhea.
sentences.cn: 结论青霉素、四环素已经不再适用于淋病的治疗.

sentences.en: Gonorrhea and other Bacterial infections involving the prostate are treated with antibiotics.
sentences.cn: 淋病和其它细菌感染导致的前列腺疾病可用抗生素治疗.

sentences.en: Gonorrhea and syphilis are venereal diseases.
Gonorrhea can occur in the reproductive organs, urethra, rectum and throat.
sentences.cn: 淋病可以发生在生殖器 、 尿道 、 直肠和喉咙.

sentences.en: I don’t shoot up and I’m not worried about blood transfusions, so gonorrhea, chlamydia, HPV, AIDS, etc, have nothing over me.
sentences.cn: 我没有撕痛，我不担心血液交换，所以淋病、衣原体、人类乳头状病毒和艾滋病等等，都于我何加焉。

sentences.en: No cases were all infected with gonorrhea, chlamydia and mycoplasma.
sentences.cn: 但同时感染淋球菌 、 衣原体和支原体者.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore the treatment for Gonorrhea.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨淋病治疗方案.

sentences.en: Objective To develope a sensitive method for the detection of gonorrhea antibody.
sentences.cn: 目的建立多肽抗原检测淋球菌抗体的elisa方法.

sentences.en: Penicillin and other antibiotics were miracle cures for gonorrhea and syphilis. The poor, humble condom languished.
sentences.cn: 而盘尼西林及其他抗生素可以神奇的扼杀梅毒和淋病的病毒,可怜又卑微的避孕套被冷落了.

sentences.en: Quinolones are not recommended to treat gonorrhea acquired in California or Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 不推荐应用喹诺酮类治疗在加利福尼亚或者夏威夷患上的淋病.

sentences.en: The doctor has a way to treat gonorrhea.
sentences.cn: 这位赤脚医生有治疗白浊的偏方.

sentences.en: The study did not include syphilis, gonorrhea or HIV, as earlier studies found very low prevalence of these diseases in this age group.
sentences.cn: 研究内容并不包括梅毒、淋病和艾滋病，正如先前的研究一样：在此年龄组里，以上疾病并不普遍。

sentences.en: Two common sexually transmitted infections are chlamydia and gonorrhea.
sentences.cn: 两种常见的性传播感染是衣原体和支原体.

sentences.en: Wait a minute! Were you on a poster for gonorrhea?
sentences.cn: 等一下, 你拍过性病海报 吧 ?

sentences.en: Would you please take Jane's test results for gonorrhea to the medical records department?
sentences.cn: 请把珍的淋病化验结果带到病例部去,好 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a disease of the sex organs that is passed on during sex
